card.name: Champion of Dusk
card.text: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

card.name: Mastermind's Acquisition
card.text: Choose one — • Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. • Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

card.name: Zacama, Primal Calamity
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample When Zacama, Primal Calamity enters the battlefield, if you cast it, untap all lands you control. {2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature. {2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. {2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Hornswoggle
card.text: Counter target creature spell. You create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Raging Regisaur
card.text: Whenever Raging Regisaur attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Resplendent Griffin
card.text: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permenants, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Resplendent Griffin attacks, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
card.text: Flying Sun-Crested Pterodon has vigilance as long as you control another Dinosaur.

card.name: Sun-Collared Raptor
card.text: Trample {2}{R}: Sun-Collared Raptor gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Blood Sun
card.text:
When Blood Sun enters the battlefield, draw a card.
All lands lose all abilities except mana abilities.

card.name: Naturalize
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Negate
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Mutiny
card.text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.

card.name: Arterial Flow
card.text: Each opponent discards two cards. If you control a Vampire, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Arch of Orazca
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Deadeye Brawler
card.text: Deathtouch Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Deadeye Brawler deals combat damage to a player, if you have the city's blessing, draw a card.

card.name: Sanctum of the Sun
card.text:
(Transforms from Azor's Gateway.) {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is your life total.
(Related: Azor's Gateway)

card.name: Moment of Craving
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Azor's Gateway
card.text:
{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If cards with five or more different converted mana costs are exiled with Azor's Gateway, you gain 5 life, untap Azor's Gateway, and transform it.
(Related: Sanctum of the Sun)

card.name: Return to the Wind
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Slaughter the Strong
card.text: Each player chooses any number of creatures he or she controls with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures he or she controls.

card.name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
card.text: Raid— When Deadeye Rig-Hauler enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
card.text: First strike When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast that card this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Metzali, Tower of Triumph
card.text:
(Transforms from Path of Mettle.) {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {1}{R}, {T}: Metzali, Tower of Triumph deals 2 damage to each opponent. {2}{W}, {T}: Choose a creature at random that attacked this turn. Destroy that creature.
(Related: Path of Mettle)

card.name: Path of Mettle
card.text:
When Path of Mettle enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature that doesn't have first strike, double strike, vigilance, or haste.
Whenever you attack with at least two creatures that have first strike, double strike, vigilance, and/or haste, transform Path of Mettle.
(Related: Metzali, Tower of Triumph)

card.name: Steelclad Ferocidons
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Steelclad Ferocidons is dealt damage, each opponent sacrifices a permanent.

card.name: Dire Fleet Poisoner
card.text: Flash Deathtouch When Dire Fleet Poisoner enters the battlefield, target attacking Pirate you control gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Crafty Cutpurse
card.text: Flash When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created your control instead.

card.name: Vicious Cagemaw
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Vicious Cagemaw is dealt damage, exile target creature an opponent controls until Vicious Cagemaw leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Nezahal, Primal Tide
card.text:
Nezahal, Primal Tide can't be countered.
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card.
Discard three cards: Exile Nezahal. Return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Siegehorn Ceratops
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Siegehorn Ceratops is dealt damage, put two +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)

card.name: Thunderherd Migration
card.text:
As an additional cost to cast Thunderherd Migration, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Jungle Creeper
card.text: {3}{B}{G}: Return Jungle Creeper from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dire Fleet Neckbreaker
card.text: Attacking Pirates you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Tomb Robber
card.text:
Menace
{1}, Discard a card: Tomb Robber explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Golden Demise
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, instead only creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Storm Fleet Sprinter
card.text: Haste Storm Fleet Sprinter can't be blocked.

card.name: Fanatical Firebrand
card.text: Haste {T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals one damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Protean Raider
card.text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may have Protean Raider enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Flood of Recollection
card.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.

card.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
card.text: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Rekindling Phoenix
card.text: Flying When Rekindling Phoenix dies, create a 0/1 red Elemental creature token with "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature and return target card named Rekindling Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn."

card.name: Gold-Forge Garrison
card.text:
(Transforms from Golden Guardian.)
{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. {4}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
(Related: Golden Guardian)

card.name: Golden Guardian
card.text: Defender {2}: Golden Guardian fights another target creature you control. When Golden Guardian dies this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

card.name: Polyraptor
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that is a copy of Polyraptor.

card.name: Azor, the Lawbringer
card.text:
Flying
When Azor, the Lawbringer enters the battlefield, each opponent can't cast instant and sorcery spells during that player's next turn.
Whenever Azor attacks, you may pay {X}{W}{U}{U}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

card.name: Warkite Marauder
card.text:
Flying
Whenever Warkite Marauder attacks, target creature defending player controls loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1 until end of turn.

card.name: Cherished Hatchling
card.text: When Cherished Hatchling dies, you may cast Dinosaur spells this turn as though they had flash, and whenever you cast a Dinosaur spell this turn, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature."

card.name: Baffling End
card.text:
When Baffling End enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 3 or less.
When Baffling End leaves the battlefield, target opponent create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

card.name: Forerunner of the Legion
card.text:
When Forerunner of the Legion enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Forerunner of the Heralds
card.text:
When Forerunner of the Heralds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Forerunner of the Heralds.

card.name: Forerunner of the Empire
card.text:
When Forerunner of the Empire enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever a Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Forerunner of the Empire deal 1 damage to each creature.

card.name: Forerunner of the Coalition
card.text:
When Forerunner of the Coalition enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Pirate card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Deeproot Elite
card.text: Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

card.name: Silent Gravestone
card.text:
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
{4}, {T}: Exile Silent Gravestone and all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.

card.name: Sphinx's Decree
card.text: Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.

card.name: Tomb of the Dusk Rose
card.text:
(Transforms from Profane Procession.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{2}{W}{B}，{T} : Put a creature card exiled with this permanent onto the battlefield under your control.
(Related: Profane Procession)

card.name: Profane Procession
card.text:
{3}{W}{B}: Exile target creature. Then if there are three or more cards exiled with Profane Procession, transform it.
(Related: Tomb of the Dusk Rose)

card.name: Bishop of Binding
card.text:
When Bishop of Binding enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Bishop of Binding leaves the battlefield.
Whenever Bishop of Binding attacks, target Vampire gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the power of the exiled card.

card.name: Dead Man's Chest
card.text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast nonland cards from among them as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.

card.name: Pirate's Pillage
card.text:
As an additional cost to cast Pirate's Pillage, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two colorless Treasure artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Skymarcher Aspirant
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Swift Warden
card.text: When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: World Shaper
card.text: Whenever World Shaper attacks, you may put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. When World Shaper dies, put all land cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Etali, Primal Storm
card.text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Admiral's Order
card.text:
Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

card.name: Jadelight Ranger
card.text: When Jadelight Ranger enters the battlefield it explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)

card.name: Induced Amnesia
card.text:
When Induced Amnesia enters the battlefield, target player exiles all the cards in his or her hand face down, then draws that many cards.
When Induced Amnesia is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Kumena's Awakening
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permenants, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card. If you have the city's blessing, instead only you draw a card.

card.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
card.text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Daring Buccaneer
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Daring Buccaneer, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.

card.name: Huatli, Radiant Champion
card.text:
+1: Put a loyalty counter on Huatli, Radiant Champion for each creature you control.
-1: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
-8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card."

card.name: Legion Lieutenant
card.text: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Aquatic Incursion
card.text:
When Aquatic Incursion enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. (They can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Famished Paladin
card.text:
Famished Paladin doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap Famished Paladin.

card.name: Timestream Navigator
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{2}{U}{U}, {T}, Put Timestream Navigator on the bottom of its owner's library: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Merfolk Mistbinder
card.text: Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Tilonalli's Summoner
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Tilonalli's Summoner attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, create X 1/1 Elemental creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. At the beginning of the next end step, exile those tokens unless you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Path to Discovery
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Paladin of Atonement
card.text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Paladin of Atonement.
When Paladin of Atonement dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Seafloor Oracle
card.text: Whenever a Merfolk you controls deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Temple Altisaur
card.text: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

card.name: Radiant Destiny
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) As Radiant Destiny enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. As long as you have the city's blessing, they also have vigilance.

card.name: Elenda, the Dusk Rose
card.text:
Lifelink
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Elenda, the Dusk Rose. When Elenda dies, create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is Elenda's power

card.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
card.text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

card.name: Atzal, Cave of Eternity
card.text:
(Transforms from Journey to Eternity.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
(Related: Journey to Eternity)

card.name: Journey to Eternity
card.text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control, then return Journey to Eternity to the battlefield transformed under your control.
(Related: Atzal, Cave of Eternity)

card.name: Form of the Dinosaur
card.text: When Form of the Dinosaur enters the battlefield, your life total becomes 15. At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dinosaur deals 15 damage to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to you.

card.name: Tendershoot Dryad
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Saprolings you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Enter the Unknown
card.text:
Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Gleaming Barrier
card.text:
Defender
When Gleaming Barrier dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Swaggering Corsair
card.text: Raid — Swaggering Corsair enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.name: Frilled Deathspitter
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Frilled Deathspitter is dealt damage, it deals 2 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Awakened Amalgam
card.text: Awakened Amalgam's power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control.

card.name: Secrets of the Golden City
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Draw two cards. If you have the city's blessing, draw three cards instead.

card.name: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca
card.text:
Tap another untapped Merfolk you control: Kumena, Tyrant of Orzaca can't be blocked this turn.
Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Draw a card.
Tap five untapped Merfolk you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Merfolk you control.

card.name: Dusk Charger
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Dusk Charger gets +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Atzocan Seer
card.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your manan pool.
Sacrifice Atzocan Seer: Return target Dinosaur card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: River Darter
card.text: River Darter can't be blocked by Dinosaurs.

card.name: Thrashing Brontodon
card.text: {1}, Sacrificing Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Angrath, the Flame-Chained
card.text:
+1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.
-3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has converted mana cost 3 or less.
-8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in his or her graveyard.

card.name: Vona's Hunger
card.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you have the city's blessing, instead each opponent sacrifices half the creatures he or she controls rounded up.

card.name: Captain's Hook
Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Brass's Bounty
card.text: For each land you control, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Angrath's Ambusher
card.text: Angrath's Ambusher gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Angrath planeswalker.

card.name: Vraska's Scorn
card.text: Target opponent loses 4 life. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Scheming Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Vraska's Conquistador
card.text: Whenever Vraska's Conquistador attacks or blocks, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Cinder Barrens
card.text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate
card.text:
+2: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals 1 damage to target opponent and each creature that player controls.
-3: Return target Pirate card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
-11: Destroy all creature target opponent controls. Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals damage to that player equal to their total power.

card.name: Vampire Champion
card.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Angrath's Fury
card.text: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Vraska, Scheming Gorgon
card.text:
+2: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
-3: Destroy target creature.
-10: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player loses the game."

card.name: Tetzimoc, Primal Death
card.text:
Deathtouch
{B}, Reveal Tetzimoc, Primal Death from your hand: Put a prey counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during your turn. When Tetzimoc, Primal Death enters the battlefield, destroy each creature your opponents control with a prey counter on it.

card.name: The Immortal Sun
card.text: Players can't activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Vault of Catlacan
card.text:
(Transforms from Storm the Vault.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool for each artifact you control.
(Related: Storm the Vault)

card.name: Storm the Vault
card.text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more artifacts, transform Storm the Vault.
(Related: Vault of Catlacan)

card.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
card.text: Ghalta, Primal Hunger costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control. Trample

card.name: Silvergill Adept
card.text:
As an additional cost to cast Silvergill Adept, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}.
When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.
